questions.title: Letter About Summer Vacation
questions.question: Write a letter to your friend describing your summer vacation.
paragraphs: Dhvani 16/8, 21st Cross Street Indira Nagar, Adyar Chennai - 600020 10th February 2026
Dear Rahul,
How are you? I hope you and your family are doing well. It has been quite some time since we met. I am writing to tell you about my summer vacation which was really exciting this year.

You will be happy to know that my family and I went to Dubai for a week. We visited many amazing places like the Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, and the Palm Jumeirah. The best part was the desert safari we went for. We drove over sand dunes in special cars and watched a beautiful sunset. The desert was very hot, but it was an unforgettable experience. We also went to the aquarium and saw many colourful fish and sharks.

Please convey my regards to uncle and aunty. I have many photos to show you. I hope to see you soon during the next holidays. Do write back and tell me about your vacation. Your loving friend, Anirudh

questions.title: Letter Inviting for Birthday Party
questions.question: Write a letter to your friend inviting them to your birthday party.
paragraphs: Dhvani 16/8, 21st Cross Street Indira Nagar, Adyar Chennai - 600020 10th February 2026
Dear Janina,
How are you? I hope you are doing well. I am writing to invite you to my birthday party. I am very excited and I really want you to come.

You will be happy to know that my birthday is on 25th February. My parents are organising a party at our home. The party will start at 5 PM. There will be games, music, and lots of delicious food. My mother is ordering a chocolate cake, which I know you love! We are also planning some fun activities like a treasure hunt and musical chairs.
Please do come. The party will not be complete without you. Give my regards to your parents. I am eagerly waiting for your reply. Let me know if you can make it. Your loving friend, Anirudh

questions.title: Letter About School Annual Day
questions.question: Write a letter to your cousin describing your school's Annual Day.
paragraphs: Dhvani 16/8, 21st Cross Street Indira Nagar, Adyar Chennai - 600020 10th February 2026
Dear Cousin,
How are you? I hope you and the family are doing well. I am writing to tell you about our school's Annual Day which was held last week. It was a grand celebration!

You will be happy to know that I participated in a group dance performance. We practiced for many weeks. The theme was classical dance, and we performed Bharatanatyam. The auditorium was beautifully decorated with lights and flowers. Many parents came to watch. The Chief Guest gave prizes to the winners. The best part was when our Principal announced that our dance team won the first prize! I was so happy and proud.
I wish you could have been there to see us perform. I will send you some photos soon. Please convey my regards to uncle and aunty. Do write back soon. Your affectionate cousin, Anirudh

questions.title: Letter Congratulating a Friend
questions.question: Write a letter to your friend congratulating them on winning a competition.
paragraphs: Dhvani 16/8, 21st Cross Street Indira Nagar, Adyar Chennai - 600020 10th February 2026
Dear Arjun,
How are you? I hope you are doing well. I was very happy to hear that you won the first prize in the Science Quiz competition. Congratulations! I am so proud of you.

You deserve this success because you worked very hard for it. I remember how you used to read science books and practice questions every day. Your dedication has paid off. Winning at the inter-school level is a great achievement. The best part is that you represented our school and made everyone proud. I heard the questions were very difficult, but you answered them all correctly!

Please convey my congratulations to your parents as well. They must be very happy. I hope we can celebrate together soon. Keep up the good work! You are an inspiration to all of us. Your proud friend, Anirudh

questions.title: Letter About a Visit to Mahabalipuram
questions.question: Write a letter to your friend describing a visit to a historical place.
paragraphs: Dhvani 16/8, 21st Cross Street Indira Nagar, Adyar Chennai - 600020 10th February 2026
Dear Vikram,
How are you? I hope this letter finds you in good health. I am writing to tell you about our family trip to Mahabalipuram last weekend. It was an amazing experience!

You will be happy to know that our whole joint family went together. We stayed at Chariot Beach Resort which was right next to the sea. We visited many heritage sites. The Shore Temple was beautiful - it is very old and stands right next to the ocean. We also saw Arjuna's Penance, a huge rock carving that shows stories from our mythology. The best part was the beach. The waves were so big and the sunset was like a painting with orange and pink colours.

The resort served delicious food from different cuisines. I wish you could have come with us. Next time, you must join our family trip. Please convey my regards to your parents. Do write back soon. Your loving friend, Anirudh

questions.title: Letter About Music Hobby
questions.question: Write a letter to your friend describing your hobby.
paragraphs: Dhvani 16/8, 21st Cross Street Indira Nagar, Adyar Chennai - 600020 10th February 2026
Dear Priya,
How are you? I hope you are doing well. I am writing to tell you about my hobbies which keep me very busy these days.

You will be happy to know that I am learning many forms of music. I learn Carnatic vocal and Hindustani vocal, which are two different styles of Indian classical music. I also learn mridangam, which is a South Indian percussion instrument. I used to learn tabla also, which helped me understand both the rhythm systems of Indian classical music. The best part is that music relaxes me and makes me happy. Though it requires a lot of practice, I enjoy every moment of it.

Music has taught me patience and discipline. I would love for you to hear me play sometime. Maybe during the next holidays, you can visit and I will perform for you. Please convey my regards to your parents. Do write back and tell me about your hobbies. Your loving friend, Anirudh

questions.title: Letter Thanking for a Gift
questions.question: Write a letter to your uncle thanking him for a gift.
paragraphs: Dhvani 16/8, 21st Cross Street Indira Nagar, Adyar Chennai - 600020 10th February 2026
Dear Uncle,
How are you? I hope you and aunty are doing well. I am writing to thank you for the wonderful gift you sent me on my birthday. I was so happy when I opened it!

You will be happy to know that the watch you gifted me is exactly what I wanted. The blue colour is my favourite, and it looks so stylish. I wear it to school every day and my friends really like it. The best part is that it has many features like a stopwatch and an alarm. It helps me keep track of time during my music practice and study sessions. It was very thoughtful of you to choose such a perfect gift.
Please convey my thanks to aunty as well. I hope you will visit us soon. My parents send their regards. Thank you once again for the lovely gift. Your loving nephew, Anirudh

questions.title: Letter Describing Your School
questions.question: Write a letter to your cousin describing your school.
paragraphs: Dhvani 16/8, 21st Cross Street Indira Nagar, Adyar Chennai - 600020 10th February 2026
Dear Cousin,
How are you? I hope you are doing well. You asked me about my school in your last letter. I am happy to tell you all about it.

I study in Class 7C at my school. Our school building is big and has many facilities. We have a large playground where we play football and cricket. There is also a library with thousands of books. The best part of my school is the teachers. They are very caring and explain everything clearly. My favourite subject is Mathematics because our teacher makes it interesting with puzzles and games. We also have a science laboratory where we do experiments.

My classmates are friendly and we help each other in studies. I wish you could visit my school sometime. I would love to show you around. Please convey my regards to uncle and aunty. Do write back and tell me about your school. Your affectionate cousin, Anirudh
